name: "EveryDay MediaMasks"
description: This game was created by my partner and I. With a one week deadline and the theme "I/Every Day" we came up with this concept. This  is a small 3D experience where you can walk around in a small house and yard. The concept is that you receive different masks from the media depending on what information you post online. If you're unemployed or working full-time, you will be viewed in different ways. However, as the characters all look the same aside from the gender- you don't actually know anything about said person regardless of what you think you know.
